contentList.content: Ring of Minor Strength
This ring grants a minor increase in strength to the wearer.
Ring of Greater Strength
This ring grants a greater increase in strength to the wearer.
Ring of Superior Strength
This ring grants a superior increase in strength to the wearer.
Ring of Minor Dexterity
This ring grants a minor increase in dexterity to the wearer.
Ring of Greater Dexterity
This ring grants a greater increase in dexterity to the wearer.
Ring of Superior Dexterity
This ring grants a superior increase in dexterity to the wearer.
Ring of Minor Constitution
This ring grants a minor increase in constitution to the wearer.
Ring of Greater Constitution
This ring grants a greater increase in constitution to the wearer.
Ring of Superior Constitution
This ring grants a superior increase in constitution to the wearer.
Ring of Minor Intelligence
This ring grants a minor increase in intelligence to the wearer.
Ring of Greater Intelligence
This ring grants a greater increase in intelligence to the wearer.
Ring of Superior Intelligence
This ring grants a superior increase in intelligence to the wearer.
Ring of Minor Wisdom
This ring grants a minor increase in wisdom to the wearer.
Ring of Greater Wisdom
This ring grants a greater increase in wisdom to the wearer.
Ring of Superior Wisdom
This ring grants a superior increase in wisdom to the wearer.
Ring of Minor Charisma
This ring grants a minor increase in charisma to the wearer.
Ring of Greater Charisma
This ring grants a greater increase in charisma to the wearer.
Ring of Superior Charisma
This ring grants a superior increase in charisma to the wearer.
Ring of Minor Luck

Once per day, you can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag> to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, or to make an enemy reroll their Attack Roll.
Ring of Greater Luck

Twice per day, you can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag> to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, or to make an enemy reroll their Attack Roll.
Ring of Superior Luck

Thrice per day, you can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Point</LSTag> to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, or to make an enemy reroll their Attack Roll.
